name: Dance Of The Moonlight Jellies
set-up: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 38 3 2/changeToTemporaryMap Beach-Jellies/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Vincent true 0 12 3 3000 2 0 1 3000 0 -12 -2 0 3 3000/advancedMove Jas true 0 2 3 5000 0 -2 3 5000/advancedMove Clint false 2 50000 -2 0 3 500 2 1000 3 1000 1 0 2 1000/advancedMove Harvey True 0 -12 -10 0 0 6 2 25000 0 -6 10 0 0 12 2 25000/playerControl jellies/viewport player clamp true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear
mainEvent: pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors MainEvent/changeLocation Beach/warpFarmers 28 36 2 29 35 2 34 36 2 37 35 2 25 36 2 10 39 3 30 35 2 33 35 2 36 35 2 up 25 33 3/positionOffset farmer 0 16/warp spouse 29 36/faceDirection spouse 2/specificTemporarySprite candleBoat/showFrame Pam 24/positionOffset Pam 0 12/showFrame Haley 30/viewport 26 36 true/pause 2000/move Lewis 0 1 2/move Lewis -2 0 3/pause 400/showFrame Lewis 16 true/animate Lewis false false 200 25 16 17 17/pause 800/playSound parry/specificTemporarySprite candleBoatMove/pause 500/showFrame Lewis 0 true/animate Lewis false false 200 25 12/pause 400/move Lewis 1 0 2/pause 6000/specificTemporarySprite moonlightJellies/pause 10000/playMusic moonlightJellies/pause 18000/emote Jodi 16 true/pause 800/emote Emily 16 true/pause 700/emote Abigail 56 true/pause 8500/move Jas 0 1 2/pause 300/faceDirection Jas 3 true/pause 300/jump Jas 8 true/pause 500/emote Jas 20/pause 500/viewport move -1 0 8000/pause 4000/move Caroline -2 0 3 true/pause 4000/faceDirection Sebastian 2/move Abigail 1 0 2/showFrame Abigail 24/pause 500/viewport move 1 0 21000/pause 5000/move Lewis 0 1 2/showFrame Lewis 18/pause 3000/showFrame Haley 31/pause 100/showFrame Haley 24/pause 1000/showFrame Haley 31/pause 100/showFrame Haley 30/pause 1800/showFrame Jodi 25/pause 1000/showFrame Emily 27/showFrame Haley 31/pause 100/showFrame Haley 24/pause 1000/showFrame Haley 31/pause 100/showFrame Haley 30/pause 1000/move Clint -1 0 2/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/pause 1000/message "The glow of summer has faded, now... and the moonlight jellies carry on toward the great unknown."/playMusic none/pause 2000/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Leah_spouse: Hey. I'm paying my respects to another bygone summer. I'll come meet up with you when we launch the candle-boat.
Abigail: Such a rare and exciting thing...
Robin: *yawn*... It's past my bed-time.$s#$e#Hey, did you see that candle-boat? I crafted it myself.$h
Demetrius: The 'Moonlight Jelly'... what a remarkable species! We're very lucky that they stop here on their long journey south.#$e#It's unknown why they are attracted to light... very curious.
Maru: It's kind of cold, actually. I guess fall is right around the corner.
Sebastian: I thought I saw something moving in there... something big, something dark.#$e#Just trying to scare you...$h
Pierre: Psst... Make sure to swing by the shop tomorrow to get your fall seeds!
Caroline: These candles are romantic, aren't they?
Linus: I'll just sneak up when the jellies arrive... I don't want to bother anyone.
Alex: I can't believe summer's over... I feel like it just started.$s
George: What, why are you looking at me like that? You think I'm too old to enjoy something like this?
Evelyn: I remember seeing the jellies once, as a little girl. Oh, how I jumped with joy when they arrived!#$e#But that was long ago... I'm a lot less energetic now.
Lewis: Good evening, @. The Moonlight Jellies are close... I already saw one glowing in the distance.#$b#Once we launch the candle-boat they'll come up to the docks and say hello.
Clint: I wore my special shoes tonight... No one noticed.$s
Emily: Look out there, at the endless sea. Deep underwater, all kinds of life forms are moving around in the dark.#$b#Eerie, isn't it?
Penny: Life is so easy for a jellyfish... just letting the waves carry you onward forever.
Pam: Don't tell Gus, but I'm a little disappointed there's no buffet tonight.
Haley: I'm gonna take a picture of the jellies when they arrive.
Jodi: There! I just saw something glowing!#$b#Oh... It's gone.$s
Kent: Good evening, @. Hope you can find some time to relax before the harvest season.
Sam: I wonder if they're poisonous?#$e#Maybe I shouldn't push Sebastian in the water after all...$h
Leah: Hey. I'm paying my respects to another bygone summer.
Shane: The jellies were here a year ago, and they'll be back again a year from now... nature is amazing.
Marnie: That's a heavy load of people for an ancient wooden dock! I'll stay over here near the beach.
Elliott: If we keep polluting the oceans, the jellies will surely go extinct. It's already in the process of happening.#$e#What a shame... we have no respect for nature anymore.
Gus: 'Moonlight Jellies'... I wonder how they taste?$h#$b#I would never try it, of course!$u
Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Wizard: How did you find me back here? I thought I was well-hidden.#$b#Perhaps you are blessed with the gift of clairvoyance.#$e#I'm here to observe the Lunaloos... or 'Moonlight Jellies', as you call them. They possess an unusually potent magical aura for an aquatic life form.
Harvey: Well, summer's over. To be honest, I'll be happy to say goodbye to these blasted mosquitos!
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Jas: I hope there are babies this year!
Vincent: I wanna see the rare green jelly!
Willy: Most night-fish would be scared of the light... these are strange ones.
Leo: The moonlight jellies are my old friends... they come to the island every year, too.
set-up_y2: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 38 3 2/changeToTemporaryMap Beach-Jellies2/viewport -1000 01000/loadActors Set-Up/positionOffset Willy 0 -20/advancedMove Haley true 3 6750 4 300 0 -2 4 300 3 5500 2 300 0 2 2 250 3 2000/advancedMove Vincent true 3 4000 2 300 1 250 3 0 0 -2 4 250 1 5350 4 300 0 -3 4 300 1 5750 2 300 0 3 2 300 1 5000 2 250 0 2 -3 0 3 2000/advancedMove Abigail true 3 4250 2 250 0 5 2 300 3 7500 4 300 0 -5 4 250 3 1000/advancedMove Caroline false 2 12500 -2 0 0 1 -13 0 0 8 2 300 3 1000/advancedMove Alex true 2 7250 1 250 3 0 1 250 2 5000 3 300 -3 0 2 3000/playerControl jellies/viewport player clamp true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear
mainEvent_y2: pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors MainEvent/changeLocation Beach/warpFarmers 28 36 2 26 36 2 33 35 2 40 35 2 27 35 2 30 35 2 37 34 2 39 34 2 up 42 35 3/positionOffset farmer 0 16/warp spouse 29 36/faceDirection spouse 2/warp Caroline 36 35/faceDirection Caroline 2 true/warp Pierre 37 35/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/specificTemporarySprite candleBoat/viewport 26 36 true/pause 2000/move Lewis 0 1 2/move Lewis -2 0 3/pause 400/showFrame Lewis 16 true/animate Lewis false false 200 25 16 17 17/pause 800/playSound parry/specificTemporarySprite candleBoatMove/pause 500/showFrame Lewis 0 true/animate Lewis false false 200 25 12/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 6000/specificTemporarySprite moonlightJellies/pause 10000/playMusic moonlightJellies/pause 18000/emote Robin 16/pause 500/emote Jodi 56/pause 500/jump Maru/pause 500/emote Penny 20/pause 1250/emote Caroline 16/pause 1250/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 750/faceDirection Demetrius 3 true/pause 2000/faceDirection Robin 2 true/pause 750/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/pause 2500/showFrame Willy 24/pause 500/showFrame Willy 25/pause 1500/viewport move -1 0 8000/pause 2650/showFrame Kent 16/pause 1500/move Jodi 0 1 2/pause 1500/showFrame Jodi 25/pause 4500/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/pause 300/faceDirection Vincent 1 true/pause 150/move Vincent 1 0 2/move Vincent 0 2 2/pause 600/jump Vincent/pause 400/viewport move 1 0 20000/pause 2000/faceDirection Vincent 1 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/pause 1000/move Lewis 1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 2/showFrame Lewis 18/pause 4300/showFrame Demetrius 19/pause 3000/faceDirection Caroline 1 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Pierre 3 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/pause 1000/message "The glow of summer has faded, now... and the moonlight jellies carry on toward the great unknown."/playMusic none/pause 2000/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Abigail_spouse_y2: I brought a blanket for us in case we get cold later.$0#$e#It's a little small, but I'm sure we can make it work...$4
Haley_spouse_y2: Aww... It's so romantic, with all the candles.$4#$e#Goodbye, Summer...$s
Maru_spouse_y2: Do you think I have enough time to grab my telescope from the farmhouse?$0#$e#Hmm... probably not. I don't want to miss this!$0
Emily_spouse_y2: Hey, there you are!$0#$e#The ocean holds so many secrets and wonders. It's truly amazing.$0
Leah_spouse_y2: I brought some sparkling wine for the main event... Summer's not over yet!$0
Penny_spouse_y2: I would've brought us a pot of tea if I had known it would be this chilly!$0
Alex_spouse_y2: I'm just spending some time with the family for a moment. I'll meet you on the docks soon, okay?$0
Harvey_spouse_y2: Hi, honey. It'll be any moment now when the jellies show up... It never gets old!$0
Shane_spouse_y2: Are you all prepared for the fall? I am...#$e#Huh? Oh, I bought a king size bag of pumpkin chips. You can have one, if you want.
Sebastian_spouse_y2: I remember the first Moonlight Jellies festival that you came to.#$b#You didn't notice, but I was watching you when the jellies came up. You looked beautiful in that blue light...$l
Elliott_spouse_y2: Ah, I was wondering when you would arrive!$0#$e#Let's head to the docks soon, and welcome our aquatic guests!$1
Abigail_y2: Apparently there's a rare green jelly. I want to be the first to see it tonight!$0
Robin_y2: Every year, I make sure to inspect the candle-boat, and patch any holes.#$e#Imagine if it sank during the festival...$1
Demetrius_y2: There's a different kind of 'jelly', that anglers sometimes pull out of the water. Despite the name, they are very different in nature to the Moonlight Jellies...
Maru_y2: Do you see a faint glow on the horizon? That must be them!$0
Sebastian_y2: When you stare into the ocean, there's a chance something down there is looking back at you...$0
Linus_y2: I noticed no one else was using this dock, so I quietly snuck down.$0#$e#I like watching the jellies, too.
Pierre_y2: Hello, farmer @. Be sure to drop by my store tomorrow to purchase your fall seeds!$0
Caroline_y2: I'm happy the jellies choose to visit us during their trip south. It's a magical moment our community can share together.$0
Alex_y2: It's a shame that summer has to be over, but I guess that's life...$0
George_y2: Back in the old days, we used to scoop 'em up and put 'em in jars...$h#$e#Times have changed... Times have changed...
Evelyn_y2: George and I have been watching the jellies come and go together for decades now.$1
Lewis_y2: Greetings, @. As the evening sets in, the Moonlight Jellies draw closer to the shoreline.#$b#Once we set the candle-boat on its way, they'll gather around the docks.$0
Clint_y2: I got too close to a wave, and it soaked my foot...$2
Penny_y2: Brr... that's a chilly breeze. I should've worn a hat!
Pam_y2: Hey, kid. You're a farmer. So tell me... can you make jelly out of these things?#$e#Would save me a lot of money if I could top my toast that way!$1
Emily_y2: The moonlight jellies possess a deep blue aura of mystery...$0#$e#There's more to them than meets the eye.$0
Haley_y2: I didn't have time to put on makeup... Do you think anyone would notice in the dark?
Jodi_y2: The full moon will guide the jellies to our shore.
Kent_y2: Hey. Got big plans for the fall?
Marlon_y2: I may only have one good eye left, but I assure you I will spot any fell creature lurking the dark.
Sam_y2: Summer is drawing to a close. I'm gonna miss the long days!
Leah_y2: Have any fun plans for the fall season? I need to decorate my house soon.
Shane_y2: I wonder how many will show up this year?$0
Marnie_y2: I can't go any further on the dock. The sounds of creaking wood is causing me to tremble.$s#$e#When I was a little girl, I fell through a rotten dock once, and it traumatized me...$s
Elliott_y2: The candle lights shimmering on the water are simply breathtaking. It looks like a painting coming to life.$0
Gus_y2: *sniff* Ahh... the fresh smell of the ocean never fails to satisfy.$0
Dwarf_y2: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Wizard_y2: The glowing eggs of the Lunaloos make for a potent reagent...
Harvey_y2: With each passing second, my anticipation grows...$0
Sandy_y2: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Jas_y2: How do the jellies know where to swim if they don't have eyes?$0
Vincent_y2: I touched a jelly once and it stung my hand.$2
Willy_y2: It's an old fisherman's rule... if you ever fish up a moonlight jelly, you gotta throw her back into the sea.$0
Leo_y2: My old friends from home are visiting us soon!$1
